monster.name: Coldryum, The Crystal Nightmare

trait.name: Frozen Armor (Mythic Trait: Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Coldryum is reduced to 0 HP, he doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, he regains 260 hit points. In addition, Coldryum casts the armor of agathys spell on himself, as a 9th level spell. Finally while he has at least 1 hit point, each creature within 10 feet of him takes 15 cold damage at the start of each of his turns.

trait.name: Mirror Reflection
entries: While Coldryum is under direct sunlight, creatures that can see him have disadvantage on attack rolls against him.

trait.name: Crystal Reflection
entries: Whenever Coldryum is subjected to radiant damage, he takes no damage. Instead all creatures within 30 feet of him must make a {@dc 24} Con save, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) radiant damage and being {@condition blinded} on a failed save. On a succesful save, they take half as much damage and aren't {@condition blinded}. A {@condition blinded} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a succes.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Coldryum has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance 3/Day
entries: If Coldryum fail a saving throw, he can choose to suceed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Coldryum can use his Frightful Presence.
He then makes 3 attacks: 1 with bite and 2 with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage.
and the target must succed on a {@dc 24} Strenght saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from Coldryum.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each Creature of Coldryum's choice that is within 120 feet of him and aware of it must suceed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom Saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Coldryum's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Coldryum exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 84 ({@damage 24d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Icy Prison {@recharge 5}
entries: Coldryum freezes the air around a creature he can see wuthin 60 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or be imprisoned by a block of ice. A trapped creature is {@condition stunned}, has a total cover against attacks and other effects outside the block, and take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of it turns, freeing itself on a success. The creature is also freed if the block is destroyed, which is a Huge Object with AC 18, 30 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

reaction.name: Frigid Shield
entries: When a creature Coldrym can see targets him with an attack. Coldryum gains 20 temporary hit points. If the attack hits and reduces the temporary hit points to 0, each creature within 5 feet of Coldryum takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage.

legendaryHeader: Coldryum can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Coldryum regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Coldryum makes a Wisdom ( Perception ) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Coldryum makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack ( Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Coldryum beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must suceed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.
Coldryum can then fly up to half his flying speed.

mythicHeader: If Coldryum's mythic trait is active, he can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Frozen Armor.

mythic.name: Frozen Impalement ( Costs 3 actions)
entries: Coldryum summons ice spikes from the ground. All creatures on the ground of his choice within 120 feet of him must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) piercing damage and is {@condition restrained} by being impaled on the spike. A creature can use an action to remove itself (or a creature it can reach) from the spike, ending the condition.
